title: Can we let solo laners carry games again?
body:
Please, get rid of junglers being so overly powerful early game, its so sickening when say, you're playing mid, and you're dominating your lane opponent but you still lose the game 20 mins in because they had a lee that ganked every lane and you had an afk farming graves, eventually the lee flash Rs me and then my opposing laner easily catches up, this also makes the whole snowball problem even worse since the team with the better jungler will snowball into a 20 min victory 9 out of 10 times since even if you're doing well yourself as a top/mid if their jungler is destroying your whole team you're gonna get deathballed on 15 mins in and lose the game with no chance to have impact on the game.

Junglers shouldnt be the only thing that matters in the first 20 mins, its supposed to be a team game isnt it?

Junglers decide the first 20 (basically the whole game) and then bot lane decides the rest of the match, where does that leave mid and top?? You're basically forced to play the meta broken champions to have any kind of chance to impact the game (like azir/gp/camille/katarina), feel like playing ahri mid or irelia top? Hope you have fun having 0 impact on the game outcome.

I remember in season 2 if i played well irelia i could take over the game, destroy junglers/bot lane and solo carry the game, that is not even close to being possible anymore because of how much power junglers and supports have been given for absolutely free (like how its impossible to put junglers behind cause of catch up exp).

You do realize that there is no jungler capable of "outfarming" laners right?

There simply arent enough jungle camps for that, at least if only controlling one jungle.

What actually happens is that Shyvana clears the entire/half enemy jungle while they gank toplane and then clears her own while enemy jungle recalls.

Then goes to gank in the downtime while enemy jungle runs around trying to see if any of their camps are up x)

...That or she takes dragon the moment enemy jungle goes top, at least i do when playing her, free stats are freelo.


And even if you die mid once you won't lose lane instantly, 1 kill is about 15 minions so if you truly smash the lane you´d have a 30 CS lead even if you do not kill the enemy laner?
If Shyvana starts to go on a rampage she will naturally also take lane minions when pushing towers and some of that farm would probably have went to another player.

"Farm" is often mistaken for "gold." The jungler's cs can be lower than a laner's but they could have more gold easily, especially someone like Shyvana or Kayn.  Shyvana can outfarm mid or top without breaking a sweat for sure. I see it in plenty of games.

Junglers that farm fast farm WAY too fucking fast compared to normal junglers need toned down a bit. And junglers who farm slowly are so slow they are literally unplayable due to it. They should tone down champs like Shyvana and Kayn and help the shitty junglers, but this is Riot we're talking about.

By the 10 minutes mark a jungler can clear their jungle at most 3 times, for around 1500-1600 gold.

In the same timespan a laner will if CS'ing as perfectly as above jungle clears will have around 2100 gold.

Tell me again, how the heck can a jungler outfarm a laner?

They don't, not without getting fed and taking over either the enemy jungle or lanes.

And the only really shitty jungler that struggles to farm is fiddlesticks as far as i know, the others have problems in other areas.

You're imagining a perfect world where neither mid laner is pressuring each other, and neither bot, top or junglers interfere with mid or top. A world where everyone is allowed to CS perfectly.

That doesn't exist. This is why Junglers like Shyvana and Kayn can have more gold with no kills or assists than their mid or top laners. The tendency for your lane opponent to try to kill you, harass you, or zone you is much much much greater than the tendency of the enemy jungler to try to take your camps because of factors such as not knowing the timers of the small camps, not knowing if the buffs are actually there, worrying about being collapsed on, or being killed by the enemy jungler. If you're a powerfarming jungler, there basically is no chance for the enemy to steal your camps either, because you're always doing them quickly.

TLDR: Your scenario already takes what I said into account when it comes to clearing the jungle 3 times by 10 minutes. That is easy and happens often. But mid or top rarely get to cs perfectly without being ganked, harassed, or dying 1v1.

You know, you were almost making an excellent point....but you kinda ruined it all by mentioning lanes getting ganked.

That was something i was intending to comment on already though, for i intentionally left that hole in my first comment waiting for someone to stumble into it as someone thoughtless definitely would. 

You´d argue that laners can't farm perfectly?  Did you ever stop to consider the fact that for my claim that one can clear the jungle 3 times in 10 minutes the jungler would have to instantly clear all the camps the moment they spawn after the first time?

That and they must never gank either, to ensure that they don't waste any time or having to recall.


So do tell me, between a laner missing only 10 CS until 10 minutes and a jungler perfectly clearing all the camps when they spawn with no downtime and still managing to react to enemy jungle, which is more unrealistic?


I myself find it kinda difficult to believe that a jungler could manage to not only perfectly clear their jungle with almost no downtime twice in a row after the first time and still somehow maintain map pressure and keep enemy jungle under watch.

Have you ever watched Shyvana, Udyr, or Kayn? They quite literally do what you just said. Shyvana in particular can clear camps in less than 4 seconds after she starts to buy some items, and with an item and a half she literally does camps in 2 seconds or less. They've nerfed her damage to monsters a few times these past two years for this reason. She can clear camps repeatedly without having to back either. Shyvana is also not that great of a ganker before level 6, which is why she tends to powerfarm her jungle and the enemy jungle camps when possible. There is a reason shyvana has the highest average jungle cs of all junglers in the game while being below average for kills and assists across junglers.

I described a scenario in which a farm jungler is not ganking when I mentioned that they don't have kills or assists. A farm jungler by definition prefers to farm, they tend NOT to gank, and they often get flamed by teammates for not applying pressure. They avoid combat in an effort to out-level everyone in the game for a power spike later. I get the feeling you intentionally forgot this in your argument.

I think jungle (and the game as a whole, but jungle more specifically) right now is a fucking joke.

One of the biggest reasons I quit jungle was because of the farming jungler meta right now. Literally the most boring shit every single game, where shyvana just gets blood razor and out tempos everyone in the game, taking dragons at 4 minutes. 

In competitive, the only viable junglers are super tanks (sejuani, gragas, jarvan, sometimes even skarner, zac) and picking anything else is to near throw a game, unless it's something like Kha, who is so fucking ridiculous right now that we aren't even going to talk about him. 

I disagree with anyone saying lee sin is broken. Right now lee sin is probably the most balanced hes been for the past 2 years. He was a little more powerful with the ability to take stopwatch+magical footware, but since that has been nerfed, he's fallen into a pretty good spot. Of course he's going to have a 20% pick rate in high elo. He always is, because he's one of the most fun champions to play in the game, and when mastered can be powerful. 

Meanwhile midlane, the same shit is picked every game. It's either malzahar, azir, zoe, ryze every single fucking game. So fun to see the enemy laner get ccd and 100-0d every time the midlaner's ult is up. Literally the most degenerate meta we've seen in quite some time mid. 

The only answer to the mega tanks in the jungle right now are super tank shredders like varus and kog. So of course those 2 are pick ban every game. Kog has been nerfed, but he will still be inevitably good in competitive at some point. 

Top is vlad gp gnar every game. I hope I don't need to explain why this is not healthy.

Overall just a shit meta.
The issue is marksmen and junglers (early pressure), don't forget. tanks are an issue to btw.
